Hello everyone,

I want to invite you to a night of music and discussion with by Father Peter Bowes. Father Peter is an incredible Teacher, an inspiring musician, the author of several books on the Christian Mystical path, and the co-director of the Order of Christ-Sophia. Father Peter is one of the few Teachers I have met who speaks from a deep well of personal experience and speaks right to my soul. Don't miss this chance to discover Father Peter's beautiful and moving music.

Peace be with you,
Shakur

Music and Mystical Tea
Join us for a night of music and discussion with singer-songwriter (and Christian Master Teacher) Father Peter Bowes. For over 25 years, Father Peter has been sharing the reality of Jesus' teachings through seminars, classes, and personal spiritual direction. Living in Oakland, California, he serves as one of two national Co-Directors of the Centers of Light, spiritual communities and schools for spiritual training and development, located in 13 cities around the country. Father Peter has created seven CDs of mystical Christian, folk-rock music and has published three books: The Word Within, The Radical Path, and Spiritual Astrology. His divinely inspired music and lectures deepen the heart, while transforming the Soul. This night of devotional music and spoken word will incorporate teachings from the mystical truths. Come and experience the Love, and hear Father Peter?s account of the joys and challenges we will find on our journey towards the Light within our beings.

Tea and refreshments will be served
